name: Barf Off
description:
HEAD TO HEAD COMPETITIVE VOMITING, REJOYCE!

INSTRUCTIONS

  1. Mash Space Bar (P1) or Enter key (P2) repeatedly.
  2. Press Up/Down/Left/Right or W/A/S/D as these appear on screen
  3. Yell a lot
  4. Overpower your opponent

CREDITS

Game made using FlashPunk engine, with bg music by AllHailTheUnikorn.

All the rest, including the terrible, terrible art, done by me.

NOTE

I realize the Barfcade jam hasn't officially started yet, but I won't have the time to participate when it does, and I wanted to make something. Also, this is probably the silliest thing I've done. Ever.

#Barfcade

UPDATE

Tie breaker was broken. Fixed.
